targets.rawSql:
SELECT
	`time`,
	CASE WHEN `Generator` IS NULL THEN NULL WHEN `Generator` > 0 THEN `Generator` ELSE NULL END AS `Gen Produktion`,
	CASE WHEN `Generator` IS NULL THEN NULL WHEN `Generator` < 0 THEN `Generator` ELSE NULL END AS `Gen Verbrauch`,
	CASE WHEN `PV Carport` IS NULL THEN NULL WHEN `PV Carport` > 0 THEN `PV Carport` ELSE NULL END AS `PV Carport`,
	CASE WHEN `PV Dach` IS NULL THEN NULL WHEN `PV Dach` > 0 THEN `PV Dach` ELSE NULL END AS `PV Dach`,
	CASE WHEN `Generator` IS NULL THEN NULL WHEN `Generator` > 0 THEN `Generator` ELSE 0 END + `PV Carport` + `PV Dach` AS `PV`,
	`Verbrauch`,
	CASE WHEN `Akku` IS NULL THEN NULL WHEN `Akku` < 0 THEN -`Akku` ELSE NULL END AS `Akku laden`,
	CASE WHEN `Akku` IS NULL THEN NULL WHEN `Akku` > 0 THEN `Akku` ELSE NULL END AS `Akku entladen`,
	CASE WHEN `Netz` IS NULL THEN NULL WHEN `Netz` > 0 THEN `Netz` ELSE NULL END AS `Netzbezug`,
	CASE WHEN `Netz` IS NULL THEN NULL WHEN `Netz` < 0 THEN -`Netz` ELSE NULL END AS `Einspeisung`,
	CASE WHEN `Inverter AC` IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE `Inverter AC` END AS `Inverter AC`,
	`Akku SOC`
FROM
	(SELECT
	  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(`timestamp`) * 1000 - (UNIX_TIMESTAMP(`timestamp`) * 1000) % $__interval_ms AS `time`,
	  AVG(`gen_P`) AS `Generator`,
	  AVG(`carport_P`) AS `PV Carport`,
	  AVG(`roof_P`) AS `PV Dach`,
	  AVG(`battery_P`) AS `Akku`,
	  AVG(`grid_P`) AS `Netz`,
	  AVG(`load_total_P`) AS `Verbrauch`,
	  AVG(`battery_SOC`) AS `Akku SOC`,
		AVG(`battery_discharge_total_E`) AS `battery_discharge_total_E`,
		AVG(`inverter_P`) AS `Inverter AC`
	FROM
	  log.pv
	WHERE
	  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
	GROUP BY
		`time`
	ORDER BY
	  `time` DESC) AS `t`
SELECT gen_P+carport_P+roof_P AS `val` FROM log.pv WHERE timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL 180 MINUTE  ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT load_total_P AS `load_total_P` FROM log.pv WHERE timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL 180 MINUTE  ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT battery_P AS `battery_P` FROM log.pv WHERE timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL 180 MINUTE  ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT battery_V*0.01 AS `battery_V` FROM log.pv WHERE timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL 60*12 MINUTE  ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT `battery_SOC` AS `battery_SOC` FROM log.pv WHERE timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL 60*12 MINUTE  ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT grid_P AS `grid_P` FROM log.pv WHERE timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL 180 MINUTE  ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT inverter_P AS `inverter_P` FROM log.pv WHERE timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL 180 MINUTE  ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT backup_P AS `backup_P` FROM log.pv WHERE timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL 180 MINUTE  ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT roof_P AS `roof_P` FROM log.pv WHERE timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL 180 MINUTE  ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT carport_P AS `carport_P` FROM log.pv WHERE timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL 180 MINUTE  ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT gen_P AS `gen_P` FROM log.pv WHERE timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL 180 MINUTE  ORDER BY timestamp ASC

SELECT
  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(`timestamp`) * 1000 - (UNIX_TIMESTAMP(`timestamp`) * 1000) % $__interval_ms AS `time`,
  (AVG(heatsink_T) -1000) * 0.1 AS `Heatsink`,
  (AVG(battery_T) -1000) * 0.1 AS `Battery`,
  (AVG(DC_transformer_T) -1000) * 0.1 AS `DC Transformer`,
  MAX((`status` & 8) >> 3)+0 AS `Grid status`,
  MAX((`status` & 16) >> 4) AS `Gen status`,
  MAX((`status` & 32) >> 5) AS `Something status`
FROM
  log.pv
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
GROUP BY
  `time`
ORDER BY
  `time` DESC
SELECT roof_V*0.1 AS `roof_V` FROM log.pv WHERE timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL 180 MINUTE  ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT carport_V*0.1 AS `carport_V` FROM log.pv WHERE timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL 180 MINUTE  ORDER BY timestamp ASC

SELECT
	`time`,
	CASE WHEN `inverter_p1_P` IS NULL THEN NULL WHEN `inverter_p1_P` < 0 THEN `inverter_p1_P` ELSE 0 END AS `inverter_p1_P_in`,
	CASE WHEN `inverter_p1_P` IS NULL THEN NULL WHEN `inverter_p1_P` > 0 THEN  `inverter_p1_P` ELSE 0 END AS `inverter_p1_P_out`,
	CASE WHEN `inverter_p2_P` IS NULL THEN NULL WHEN `inverter_p2_P` < 0 THEN `inverter_p2_P` ELSE 0 END AS `inverter_p2_P_in`,
	CASE WHEN `inverter_p2_P` IS NULL THEN NULL WHEN `inverter_p2_P` > 0 THEN  `inverter_p2_P` ELSE 0 END AS `inverter_p2_P_out`,
	CASE WHEN `inverter_p3_P` IS NULL THEN NULL WHEN `inverter_p3_P` < 0 THEN `inverter_p3_P` ELSE 0 END AS `inverter_p3_P_in`,
	CASE WHEN `inverter_p3_P` IS NULL THEN NULL WHEN `inverter_p3_P` > 0 THEN  `inverter_p3_P` ELSE 0 END AS `inverter_p3_P_out`,
	CASE WHEN `inverter_P` IS NULL THEN NULL WHEN `inverter_P` < 0 THEN -`inverter_P` ELSE 0 END AS `inverter_P_in`,
	CASE WHEN `inverter_P` IS NULL THEN NULL WHEN `inverter_P` > 0 THEN  `inverter_P` ELSE 0 END AS `inverter_P_out`
FROM
	(SELECT
	  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(`timestamp`) * 1000 - (UNIX_TIMESTAMP(`timestamp`) * 1000) % $__interval_ms AS `time`,
	  AVG(`inverter_p1_P`) AS `inverter_p1_P`,
	  AVG(`inverter_p2_P`) AS `inverter_p2_P`,
	  AVG(`inverter_p3_P`) AS `inverter_p3_P`,
	  AVG(`inverter_P`) AS `inverter_P`
	FROM
	  log.pv
	WHERE
	  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
	GROUP BY
		`time`
	ORDER BY
	  `time` DESC) AS `t`
SELECT inverter_p1_P AS `inverter_p1_P` FROM log.pv WHERE timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL 180 MINUTE  ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT inverter_p1_V*0.1 AS `inverter_p1_V` FROM log.pv WHERE timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL 180 MINUTE  ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT inverter_frq*0.01 AS `inverter_frq` FROM log.pv WHERE timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL 180 MINUTE  ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT inverter_p2_P AS `inverter_p2_P` FROM log.pv WHERE timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL 180 MINUTE  ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT inverter_p2_V*0.1 AS `inverter_p2_V` FROM log.pv WHERE timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL 180 MINUTE  ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT load_frq*0.01 AS `load_frq` FROM log.pv WHERE timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL 180 MINUTE  ORDER BY timestamp ASC

SELECT
	`time`,
	`inverter_p1_V`,
	`inverter_p2_V`,
	`inverter_p3_V`
FROM
	(SELECT
	  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(`timestamp`) * 1000 - (UNIX_TIMESTAMP(`timestamp`) * 1000) % $__interval_ms AS `time`,
	  0.1*AVG(`inverter_p1_V`) AS `inverter_p1_V`,
	  0.1*AVG(`inverter_p2_V`) AS `inverter_p2_V`,
	  0.1*AVG(`inverter_p3_V`) AS `inverter_p3_V`
	FROM
	  log.pv
	WHERE
	  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
	GROUP BY
		`time`
	ORDER BY
	  `time` DESC) AS `t`
SELECT inverter_p3_P AS `inverter_p3_P` FROM log.pv WHERE timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL 180 MINUTE  ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT inverter_p3_V*0.1 AS `inverter_p3_V` FROM log.pv WHERE timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL 180 MINUTE  ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT grid_frq*0.01 AS `grid_frq` FROM log.pv WHERE timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL 180 MINUTE  ORDER BY timestamp ASC

SELECT
	`time`,
	`inverter_frq`,
	`load_frq`,
	`grid_frq`
FROM
	(SELECT
	  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(`timestamp`) * 1000 - (UNIX_TIMESTAMP(`timestamp`) * 1000) % $__interval_ms AS `time`,
	  0.01*AVG(`inverter_frq`) AS `inverter_frq`,
	  0.01*AVG(`load_frq`) AS `load_frq`,
	  0.01*AVG(`grid_frq`) AS `grid_frq`
	FROM
	  log.pv
	WHERE
	  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
	GROUP BY
		`time`
	ORDER BY
	  `time` DESC) AS `t`
SELECT inverter_P AS `inverter_P` FROM log.pv WHERE timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL 180 MINUTE  ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT UNIX_TIMESTAMP(NOW())-UNIX_TIMESTAMP(`inverter_timestamp`) AS `Offset` FROM log.pv_values LIMIT 1

SELECT
    DATE(`date`) AS `date`,
    `load` * 0.1 AS `Verbrauch`,
    `pv` * 0.1 AS `PV`,
    `gen` * 0.1 AS `Generator`,
    `grid_in` * 0.1 AS `Netzbezug`,
    `grid_out` * 0.1 AS `Einspeisung`,
    `battery_charge` * 0.1 AS `Akku laden`,
    `battery_discharge` * 0.1 AS `Akku entladen`
FROM
    `log`.`pv_E`
WHERE
    $__timeFilter(date)

SELECT
    UNIX_TIMESTAMP(DATE(CONCAT(YEAR(`date`),'-',MONTH(`date`),'-01')))+15*24*3600 AS `time`,
    SUM(`pv`) * 0.1 AS `PV`,
    SUM(`gen`) * 0.1 AS `Generator`,
    SUM(`grid_in`) * 0.1 AS `Netzbezug`,
    SUM(`grid_out`) * 0.1 AS `Einspeisung`,
    SUM(`battery_charge`) * 0.1 AS `Akku laden`,
    SUM(`battery_discharge`) * 0.1 AS `Akku entladen`,
    SUM(`load`) * 0.1 AS `Verbrauch`
FROM
    `log`.`pv_E`
WHERE
    $__timeFilter(date)
GROUP BY
    `time`
